articles.author: Staff and wire reports, Austin American-Statesman
articles.title: After plea from Ukraine, Elon Musk says SpaceX’s Internet service available for war-torn nation - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Ukraine's usual internet service has been disrupted by Russia's attack. Elon Musk responded to a plea, saying  Starlink satellites were now available.
articles.content: Responding to a plea from one of Ukraine's officials, Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk said Saturday that the satellite internet system operated by SpaceX is now available for Ukrainans to use as they … [+2391 chars]

articles.author: Reid J. Epstein, Astead W. Herndon
articles.title: CPAC Focuses on Culture Grievances and Trump - The New York Times
articles.description: The annual gathering of American conservatives reflected the G.O.P’s shift away from policy issues that had traditionally animated the party.
articles.content: John Schnatter, the pizza magnate who in 2018 resigned as chairman of the Papa Johns franchise after using a racial slur in a comment about Black people during a conference call, mingled among the cr… [+1932 chars]

articles.title: 30 Reasons Why Walking Is the Best Exercise - 24/7 Wall St.
